title: [悠二評測]AMD 二代 RYZEN R5 2600X 6C12T

replies.msg:
第一代RYZEN CPU中RYZEN R5 1600被譽為性價比最高的多功能CPU, 出色的多核處理之餘也有不俗的遊戲表現。一年後AMD推出第2代RYZEN CPU, 改善了核心頻率加速技術, 同時大幅改善DDR4延遲問題, 並且將核心超頻上限空間提升多10%。AMD RYZEN R5 2600X能否延續上代R5 1600的神話呢?

http://yujihw.com/review/amd-ryzen-r5-2600x-6c12t-test

另外我岩岩用左全日測試

配Gigabyte X470 Gaming 7

用八核2700X

1.4375V超到4.3GHz

我呢粒算係體質唔錯

3600Mhz CL14

cinebench成功達到1986分

可惜依然未破2000分
原來都係rog 俾

1.55v ?
amd 話safe voltage係幾多?
可唔可以降頻去2600嘅速度跑一次benchmark

Another interesting tidbit is that the 'Skylake-X' Refresh will switch over to the Solder Thermal Interface Material (STIM) for the Integrated Heat Spreader (IHS) from the current Polymer Thermal Interface Material (PTIM). Intel has observed STIM parts reaching anywhere between 150-200 MHz boosts in both base and turbo clocks. The aim, apparently, is to push for 5 GHz on the 12 core and 14 core SKUs with TDP estimated to be in the 275-300W range. The increased TDP will require new VRM layouts, which means new motherboards will likely be introduced for this refresh.
